New Records: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 122 off 61 balls, marking his highest T20I score.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 5 wickets for 4 runs, achieving his best bowling figures in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 122 off 61 balls.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 5 wickets for 4 runs.
India posted a total of 212/2 in 20 overs.
Afghanistan was restricted to 111/8 in 20 overs.
India won the match by 101 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan won the toss and elected to field first.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli was named Player of the Match for his unbeaten 122 off 61 balls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
India scored 50 runs in the first 5.5 overs without losing a wicket.
Afghanistan lost 5 wickets in the powerplay, scoring only 21 runs.
